title: Apron
description: rectangular apron with black side edges and seed fringe; geometric cross stitch bands in red, white and black separated by appliqued strips of blue, white and black; faded blue lining; ties: left 29\", right 21\"
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
